brief_title: Aripiprazole in Patients With Psychosis Associated With Parkinson's Disease
brief_summary: The purpose of this clinical research study is to assess the safety and tolerability of aripiprazole in patients with psychosis associated with Parkinson's disease.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Primary diagnosis of idiopathic Parkinson's disease. - Psychosis related to Parkinson's disease. Exclusion Criteria: - Psychosis present prior to diagnosis of Parkinson's disease.
